about_the_game:
This is a strategy game that combines Rubik's Cube rotations with tactical battles. Players can rotate the terrain to create optimal attack environments, using their wits to gain the upper hand. Equip your chosen weapons to attack enemies or lure them into attacking each other.

Form your team! Equip the right weapons and armor, and outmaneuver your foes! Level up with experience points! Invest in different skill trees, craft various gear at your base, and unlock unique attack methods!

You can even connect paths between terrains by rotating the cube, moving to new sections to strike at your enemies. After escaping the prison, explore the Rubik's Cube land through the seasons, and recover the lost kingdom's treasures!

Rubik's Cube + Chess + Roguelike = ?
Playing chess on a Rubik's Cube? And I brought a shotgun?
--
They say I'm not fit for this prison--
A prison for the guilty--
I agree--
But they only got it half right--
I can twist this space with ease--
Leaving here is a piece of cake for me!
--
In this Rubik's Cube land, begin your journey of redemption, reclaim the lost kingdom's treasures...
